tool_description: Send messages & files to WhatsApp accounts for free.
name: Free Whatsapp Sender
title: Free Whatsapp Sender

api_list.name: send_file
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://free-whatsapp-sender.p.rapidapi.com/send_file"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-whatsapp-sender.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
